Compute model posterior and entropy

Source: R/compute_posterior.R
compute_posterior.Rd

Compute model posterior and entropy

Usage

compute_posterior(
  NV,
  DP,
  gene,
  priors = NULL,
  tumor_type,
  purity,
  entropy_cutoff,
  rho = 0.01,
  karyotypes
)

Arguments

NV

Number of reads with the variant.

DP

Sequencing coverage of the mutated genome site.

gene

Gene name or symbol.

priors

Prior distribution.

tumor_type

Tumor type of the sample.

purity

Purity of the sample.

entropy_cutoff

Cut-off on entropy for Tier-1/Tier-2 distinction.

rho

The over-dispersion parameter.

karyotypes

Karyotypes to be included among the possible classes.

Value

A table including ploidy, multiplicity, posterior probability, and classification entropy.

Examples

compute_posterior(
NV = 170,
DP = 200,
gene = 'TP53',
priors = NULL,
tumor_type = 'BRCA',
purity = 0.9,
entropy_cutoff = 0.2,
rho = 0.01,
karyotypes = c("1:0", "1:1", "2:0", "2:1", "2:2")
)
#> # A tibble: 1,600 × 11
